Description: Ensure login API returns success for valid username and password

Send a POST request to the API with headers and payload
TestSteps.Action: POST request to the constructed URL with Headers and Payload

TestSteps.Action: Compare the response status code with the expected status code

TestSteps.StepDescription: Validate the 'message' value in the response body
